name: Rocket Junker
description:
“Rocket Junker” is a 3D micro open-world game where the player will navigate the spherical terrain of an alien planet.

The pieces of your rocket are scattered around the planet –  hidden in secluded islands, sky scraping mountains, and burning volcanoes. Explore the planet and find all your rocket junk to win the game. You must discover,  hunt, and gather materials to craft upgraded gear that help you reach greater heights and overcome hazards. Can you rebuild your rocket home?

View the pitch here!
